ti:work.ti:title: Art of Beauty
Les Fards ou Soins du visage
Medicamina faciei femineae

ti:translation.ti:label: Medicamina Faciei Femineae, The Art of Love in Three Books The remedy of love. The art of beauty. The court of love. The history of love amours.
